##  Smokeless Muzzleloader
1. Concept: A 750yd, .50-cal tack driver that is legal to hunt extended seasons with and capable of any big game, but cheap to shoot and fun  
1. Rem700-style custom action: 
    1. [Mack bros EVO II](https://macbros.com/product/evo-ii-muzzleloader-action/)
    1. [Defiance Outcast](https://defiancemachine.com/actions/outcast/)
    1. Savage 110
1. [Arrowhead Breech plug](https://www.rokslide.com/arrowhead-breech-plug-for-remington-muzzleloader-review/)
1. Barrel from [Hart](https://hartbarrels.com/) with the breech plug work (right here in LaFayette!)
1. Optics: Something entry-level like Osprey Global or Arken, 10-40x50 or so, I like mil dot illuminated
1. Muzzle brake it, because why not, you can have any features you want on a muzzleloader!
1. Make a custom laminate stock: mostly, for fun
    1. Build up from laser cut wood veneer, laminate with epoxy and CNC mill
    1. Floated barrel and bedded action
    1. Built-in weight adjustment
1. [Examples](https://www.blueprintedfirearms.com/smokeless-muzzleloaders)
